trans-unit.source: Specifies how to handle entries in an event log that has reached its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何处理已达到最大文件大小的事件日志中的项。

trans-unit.source: Every event log has a maximum size limit and a configurable setting that provides the rule for writing new entries at that limit.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件日志包含的最大大小限制并提供用于写入新条目达到该限制的规则的可配置设置。

trans-unit.source: When the event log has reached its maximum size, you can specify one of the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 当事件日志达到其最大大小时，可以指定以下规则之一：

trans-unit.source: New entries will overwrite older entries.
New entries will either be discarded or will overwrite existing entries depending upon the age of the existing entries.
trans-unit.target: 新项将被放弃，或将覆盖现有条目，这取决于的现有条目的期限。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> method to set the overflow behavior for an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>方法以设置的溢出行为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>。

trans-unit.source: Check the current configured behavior of an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> through its <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前配置的行为的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>通过其<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that existing entries are retained when the event log is full and new entries are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 指示当事件日志已满时保留现有日志项，而放弃新日志项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that each new entry overwrites the oldest entry when the event log is full.
trans-unit.target: 指示当事件日志已满时用每个新日志项覆盖最旧的日志项。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that new events overwrite events older than specified by the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays" /> property value when the event log is full.
trans-unit.target: 指示当事件日志已满时用新事件覆盖保留时间已超过 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays" /> 属性值指定的时间的事件。

trans-unit.source: New events are discarded if the event log is full and there are no events older than specified by the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件日志已满并且没有任何事件的保留时间已超过 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays" /> 属性值指定的时间，则放弃新事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example enumerates the event logs defined on the local computer, and displays configuration details for each event log.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例枚举的本地计算机上定义的事件日志，并显示每个事件日志的配置详细信息。
